title: By the King. A proclamation for the apprehending of James Duke of Monmouth, Ford Lord Gray, Sir Thomas Armestrong knight, and Robert Ferguson
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most Sacred Majesty,
notes: Dated at end: Given at our court at Whitehall this twenty eighth day of June, 1683. In the five and thirtieth year of our reign.
Arms 234; Steele notation: Ford  Law.  him.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C.
